replies.body: I honestly don't understand how I did not get it, I improved my behavior just to receive this icon and 100% sure I did not receive a ban or a chat restriction within that time period.
Good to hear, but that shouldn't be the reason that you improve your behaviour. You should do it for everyone.

See above comment

> Hey there, the icon will not appear at the top of your summoner icon list because it was actually created some time ago and the list sorts by creation date.
> If you have Ocean Week Fizz or any 2015 EU LCS icons, the positive player icon should appear somewhere around them.
thanks i was really confused about it and this helped alot so thank you
Yeah it's not there. Better luck next year I guess.
Why didn't I get it? I don't ever recall being restricted or banned for the last 3 months in any queue.

Hey there, the icon **will not appear at the top of your summoner icon list** because it was actually created some time ago and the list sorts by creation date.
If you have Ocean Week Fizz or any 2015 EU LCS icons, the positive player icon should appear somewhere around them.
Oh I thought there would be some sort of notification, thanks!
Yes I got it :D. Thanks Riot for appreciating the respectful and kind players. My {{champion:27}} Support must be too good :)
Please will you do something about this, you should have a warning if someone says something mean, it should be like moshi monsters where you can only say nice things haha{{champion:34}}

Yeah bros got it :D but when are you going to actually suspend the annoying mean players who cyberbully I mean its not going to stop them from playing the agme in a mean way is it? Think about it, Oh I got a five minute bann from co op..Ill just wait it out. Next minute you know this doushe is playing with me again..Rito get off your asses{{summoner:12}}
thx for the new adc stuff
took me a while to find it :p
